name: ttursas Balance Collection
description:
This collection contains the following Perfect Balance and Imperfect Balance games:

- Imperfect Balance

- Imperfect Balance 2

- Imperfect Balance 3

- Perfect Balance

- Perfect Balance: Playground

- Perfect Balance: New Trials

- Perfect Balance 2

- Perfect Balance 3

- Perfect Balance 3: Last Trials

The games are provided as Flash .swf files with Flash players (v10, v25 and v29) for Windows, macOS and Linux.

PS. The profits from selling this collection go into maintaining a level database server for Drop Dead: Cannon and Drop Dead: Remains!
